name: Please Take Me With You!! I Can Be of Great Help to You!!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea

trigger.text: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand.

text: Main If your Leader is [Jinbe] and you have 2 or less cards in your hand, draw 2 cards.
